## Site

- Title: Kevin Gugelmann | Product Designer. AI-Native Engineer.
- Tagline: Product Designer. AI-Native Engineer.
- Description: I'm an AI-native Product Designer and UX Engineer with a Cognitive Science background, designing and shipping human-centered products end to end.
- Base URL: https://kevingugelmann.com

## Key CTAs

- Navigation: Book a call → https://cal.com/kevgug/intro
- Contact section: Schedule a call → https://cal.com/kevgug/intro; Email me → mailto:kevin@kevingugelmann.com

## Section Summaries

- Introduction: Headshot; final title “Product Designer. AI-Native Engineer.”; highlights about JPMC Figma plugins, Freestyle site, UChicago wins.
- Projects: Collection of case studies and shipped work across AI infra, fintech, EV SaaS, mobile and desktop apps.
- Contact: Headline “YC to Fortune 50. I'm Kevin Gugelmann.” with conversion-focused proof points and primary CTAs.
- Footer: “Designed in Sketch. Developed with Svelte.” and copyright.

## Project Summaries

- JPMorganChase: Launched Figma plugin with 500x perf; chart generator; AI toolkit for designers.
- Freestyle (YC S24): Website/blog to 2k+ monthly visitors; Rust-based JS runtime contributions.
- GridLink (Techstars '23): Redesigned EV fleet UI; shipped React components.
- Arc Browser iOS Redesign: 30‑day redesign; published on Medium.
- Zeesta Labs: Brand + React Native app for medical AI startup.
- Sport Video Analysis App: Desktop UI; ten interactive states for training review.
- UChicago Designathon Winner: Prize‑winning mobile app built in 5 hours.
- Trade Finance Distribution Initiative: Webflow redesign doubling traffic; rewrote 1k+ words of copy.
- Mindxone: Co‑founded tag‑based content web app to MVP.
- Task App with Focus Timer: Flutter iOS task app with micro‑interactions.
- Panorama Mail: Concept mail app with Panorama triage; 50+ animated artboards.
- Prismatic News: Android offline news app with TTS and AI highlighting; 5k+ installs.
